REMARKS: Remarkable dutch colonial revival home with a blend of breathtaking period detail and modern design. The kitchen is very 21st century--airy and light, six burner Viking, informal dining area--perfect for entertaining and socializing. Private third floor suite has twin walk-in closets, an east facing deck with treetop views. Other unusual features include a sunroom, a well preserved 19th century sleeping porch, and a modern private two bedroom guest suite with a small kitchen. Useful and practical: a mudroom with lots of cubbies and cabinets, home offices, and a laundry chute. Park under the porte-cochere, or in the two car garage and overflow parking for your friends.
